      Methods in rocks.bastion.core with parameters of type HttpMethod 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommonRequestAttributes.setMethod(HttpMethod method)
      Change the HTTP method used by a request.
      Constructors in rocks.bastion.core with parameters of type HttpMethod 
      Constructor and Description
      CommonRequestAttributes(HttpMethod method, String url, Object body)
      Constructs a new instance of this object containing the following initial defaults: HTTP method: Supplied as an argument this this constructor. URL: Supplied as an argument this this constructor. Name: Initialised to be the HTTP method concatenated with the URL. Content-type: Initialised to the value of ContentType.TEXT_PLAIN. Headers: Initialised to the empty collection of headers. Query parameters: Initialised to the empty collection of query parameters. Route parameters: Initialised to the empty collection of route parameters.
      GeneralRequest(HttpMethod method, String url, String body)

      static JsonRequest JsonRequest.fromString(HttpMethod method, String url, String json)
      Construct an HTTP request containing a JSON body from the given JSON string.
